title: Spacious Floor Plans, Urban Living, Across from Lumen Field
posting_body: 520 Occidental Ave S, Seattle, WA 98104
The Nolo is the future of urban living with water, mountain, and downtown Seattle views in the new center of Seattle.
The Nolo is part of Stadium Place, a modern community designed so you can live, work and play in Seattle’s most famous neighborhoods right next door to Lumen Field.
The Nolo at Stadium Place features a variety of studio, 1, and 2 bedroom apartment homes, perched above restaurants, retail, and specialty mercantile.
With a Walkability Rating of 97, Stadium Place is a transportation mecca close to highways, Metro, Washington State Ferry system, and King Street Station.
You'll have easy access to shopping, dining, sports, arts, and entertainment -
The Nolo is next door to Lumen Field, home of the Seattle Seahawks and Sounders, and just a short walk to T-Mobile Park, where the Seattle Mariners play.
The city is at your feet, close to the waterfront, the International District, and downtown.
Pioneer Square is alive with arts and culture, boasting the largest collection of galleries in the Pacific Northwest.
The Nolo at Stadium Place features a variety of spacious studio, 1, and 2 bedroom view apartment homes each with distinctive architectural design elements and high end finishes.
Additionally, the rooftop deck offers awe-inspiring views of the Seattle area.
The loft-style homes at The Nolo have high ceilings, elegant finishes, air conditioning, and open floor plans.

The studio, one and two bedroom apartment homes offer a variety of floor plans, along with resident amenities galore, including a private screening room, top floor resident lounge, rooftop deck, and a spa-inspired fitness center.
Apartment Features:
Quartz Countertops
Mobile Kitchen Island
High-End Finishes
Stainless-Steel Appliances
Air Conditioning
Washer and Dryer
Community Features:
Resident Theater
Guest Suite
Pet-Friendly Community with Two Dog Runs and a Paw Spa
Fitness Center and Yoga Room
Onsite Controlled Access Parking and Storage
Resident Package Lockers
Resident Lounge and Game Room
Private Courtyard with Fire Pits, Grills, and Comfy Seating Overlooking Lumen Field
